Moze grafika nie za specjalna, ale sama gra i fabula sa NIESAMOWITE dla graczy, ktorzy jeszcze tej gry nawet nie znaja, a nawet dla tych, ktorzy grali juz w druga czesc. Nie mam polskich znakow, bo mam jakas dziwna klawiature ;-;
A valve classic. definitely worth playing.

The speedrun fling on chamber 7 is stupid and bad and makes the entire game, even outside of speedrunning, completely terrible and unplayable. Worst video "game" I have ever played. 0/10 Literally Unplayable.

This game is wonderful. Innovate gameplay - the concept of using portals to accomplish tasks is difficult, but a lot of fun! The storyline behind Portal is also quite incredible - most of that comes with the sequel (Portal 2, of course), but playing the first game helps you to enjoy and understand the second one even more, and each can be played on their own.

Portal is worth your money, and I highly recommend it. My brother and I completed it in about 3.5 hours, and if you are left wanting more, try Portal 2 which will give you A LOT more (like 12 hours more...)

Happy Portaling!

SO you put a portal and uh you um so you can put a portal but you walk and you can go uh through you go through the uh you can place down a portal or you uh you shoot a portal out of the gun for portals gun and you can walk in the portal but you can't walk in the portal unless you you you uh you shoot two portal and then you can put stuff or yourself you go can be through the uh teleport in the portals between them so that it issssss uhhh teleport i mean. Portal is one of the best puzzle games ever made. Valve did an outstanding job
What a great game! 18 levels, and as levels go by, the harder they get. I really recommend this game to all.

[h3]The cake is a lie.[/h3]

Portal, oh my god... absolutely brilliant! The puzzles are really hard in parts, but feel rewarding when you get through them - and until then, you're observed and commented on with sarcastic remarks! I found myself with a constant grin and chuckle at the puzzles!

Fortunately, there are also some quality mods that do not just provide replenishment, but even having the standard of the original game itself! Absolute recommendation!

Portal 2 is indeed again significantly better, but it's still worth playing the 1st part, because then the story feels more complete. In addition Portal then acts as if it were kind of a tutorial, because the 2nd part really takes it up a notch.

I liked the whole setting so much that I also bought the Portal board game!

Portal es un juego muy disfrutable, la mecÃ¡nica de los portales es muy entretenida y desafiante. A primera vista pareciera ser un juego tipo puzle en donde debes pensar bien dÃ³nde colocar los portales para pasar los niveles, si bien en algunos casos es asÃ­, puedes intuir como pasar un nivel con solo ver lo que tienes disponible, pero el chiste estÃ¡ en lograrlo.
 El juego es muy corto pero su historia se encuentra muy bien llevada y la mecÃ¡nica de juego muy bien explotada. A pesar de ser un juego del 2007 grÃ¡ficamente el juego se ve excelente, por lo que esto no supondrÃ¡ un factor que pueda afectar a la percepciÃ³n del juego. El Ãºnico problema, o mÃ¡s bien, queja personal que le encuentro son los desafÃ­os para conseguir todos los logros; para conseguir obtener oro en todos los desafÃ­os opcionales es necesario realizar "trampas", o son tÃ©cnicamente imposibles de resolver.
 En resumen es un excelente juego que no te supondrÃ¡ un reto que queme tu cabeza, pero te dejara experimentar una mecÃ¡nica jugable muy interesante en medio de un desarrollo argumental en el cual te sientes completamente inmerso.
 The cake is a lie.

If I could give this game a neutral review it would fit this game perfectly. Its an ok game...but I like portal 2 a lot more. When I played this game it was boring at first, but when I started enjoying this game it was too late because the boss was just around the corner. Im not sure if I recommend this game, its not the worst game but its not the best game either. Im still giving this game positive review.

Is it worth buying ? Maybe.

If you do not have this game i urge you to get it, it is such wonderful and compelling time , I've played though it dozens of times on different accounts, the story is well thought out, the game play is so much fun, this game is a staple in puzzle games.
UNPOPULAR OPINION: portal is better than portal 2

[h1] A Valve Classic ğŸ‘[/h1]

Relatively short, with a sequel that's even better than the first (how rare is that?). It is in the same universe as Half-Life, hence mentions of Black Mesa throughout the game (probably taking place during or right after the events of Half-Life).
